name: HISTORIC TAX CREDIT COALITION
description: National nonprofit organization that focuses on the federal Historic Tax Credit.
sampleDescriptions: TAX:  H.R. 1, Tax Reform Act of 2017 (Public Law No. 115-97) - Issues related to the Historic Tax Credit.  H.R. 1158, S.425, The Historic Tax Credit Improvement Act of 2017, general monitoring of issues related to the Historic Tax Credit.

The Historic Tax Credit Improvement Act (H.R. 1158, S.425):  issues related to the Historic Tax Credit.  The Historic Tax Credit Enhancement Act (H.R. 6081, S.3058):  issues related to the Historic Tax Credit.

The Tax Reform Act of 2017 (Public Law No. 115-97):  issues related to the Historic Tax Credit. The Historic Tax Credit Improvement Act (No Bill Number) and the Historic Tax Credit Enhancement Act (No Bill Number): issues related to the Historic Tax Credit.
The Fiscal Year 2020 National Defense Authorization Act (H.R. 2500, S.1790): Issues related to Army ground vehicles, shipbuilding, network infrastructure, and aircraft modernization.
